about_the_game:
The NASCAR Heat 2 – October Value Pack contains additional paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, XFINITY Series, and the Camping World Truck Series! This pack includes 13 new paint schemes in total. Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Brad Keselowski #2 Wurth Ford
Ryan Blaney #21 Omnicraft Ford
…

NXS:
Elliott Sadler #1 Armour 150 Years Chevrolet
…

CWTS:
Austin Cindric #19 LTi Printing Ford
John Hunter Nemechek #8 DAB Constructors Chevrolet
…

This content is also included in the 2017 Hot Pass!

name: NASCAR Heat 2 - October Value Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better

esrb.descriptors: Online Interactions not Rated by ESRB
